program.name: Zero Install Injector
program.author: Thomas Leonard
program.title: Zero Install Injector: Downloads
program.p: The injector (0launch) is a small Python program. You ask it to run a program by giving it the program's full name (a web address). The injector does not need to be installed or run as root. It does not write to any shared directories (like /usr/bin or /usr/lib). It stores downloads in a cache directory so that you don't need to download anything twice, and programs can still be used when you are off-line.
